Sentencas: A parameter set obtained from a 1 cm(2) size electrode cell is used to develop and calibrate a one-dimensional spatially resolved model.
Titulo: Performance model for large area solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It is demonstrated that this performance model precalculates the evolving operating parameters along the gas channel of a large-sized cell.
Titulo: Performance model for large area solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Input parameters are: (i) number of discretization elements N, accounting for anodic gas conversion, (ii) anodic gas flow rate and composition and (iv) operating voltage.
Titulo: Performance model for large area solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The model calculations based on data from the 1 cm(2) cell are scaled to be equivalent to a larger cell with 16 cm(2) electrode size which is used to validate the performance model.
Titulo: Performance model for large area solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The current/voltage characteristics can be predicted very accurately, even when anodic gas flow rates vary by as much as a factor of four.
Titulo: Performance model for large area solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The performance model presented herein simulates the total overvoltage and does so in a broad range of operation conditions.
Titulo: Performance model for large area solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This is done with an accuracy of the simulated current better than 6.1% for U-OP = 0.85 V, 3.8% for U-OP = 0.8 V and 3.7% for U-OP = 0.75 V.
Titulo: Performance model for large area solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It is hoped that these equations will form the basis of a greater model, capable of predicting all the conditions found throughout any industrial stack.
Titulo: Performance model for large area solid oxide fuel cells
